title: A Prize Problem: San Remo Women’s Winner Will Earn 10 Times Less Than First Man
content:
The hype for the rebooted San Remo Women might not extend to the prize-purse: Discrepancy to men's Milan-San Remo shows stark reality of gender gap in pro cycling.

Read the full article at A Prize Problem: San Remo Women’s Winner Will Earn 10 Times Less Than First Man on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
